translations.multi-agent-architecture.title: {$START_TAG_SPAN}200+{$CLOSE_TAG_SPAN} Specialized {$LINE_BREAK} AI Agents Working for You
translations.multi-agent-architecture.description: IDEM's revolutionary multi-agent architecture orchestrates hundreds of specialized AI agents, each expert in their domain, collaborating to build your complete project.
translations.multi-agent-architecture.howItWorks.desc: Like a well-coordinated team, our AI agents work together seamlessly
translations.multi-agent-architecture.workflow.orches: Master orchestrator analyzes your project and assigns specialized agents
translations.multi-agent-architecture.workflow.collab: Agents work in parallel, sharing context and ensuring consistency
translations.multi-agent-architecture.workflow.valida: Quality agents review output before presenting results to you
translations.multi-agent-architecture.categories.desi: Create stunning logos, brand identities, and UI designs in seconds. Professional-grade visuals without hiring a designer.
translations.multi-agent-architecture.categories.busi: Generate complete business plans with market analysis and financial projections. Investor-ready documents in minutes.
translations.multi-agent-architecture.categories.code: Build complete web applications from frontend to backend. Production-ready code that scales from day one.
translations.multi-agent-architecture.categories.devo: Deploy to any cloud provider with one click. Automated infrastructure that scales with your growth.
translations.multi-agent-architecture.categories.cont: Generate professional documentation, marketing copy, and SEO-optimized content. Launch-ready materials instantly.
